SELECT d.detectId, sc.companyName, po.objectName, d.sampleId, di.itemName, dr.reagentName, pt.typeName AS productTypeName, ds.sourceName, dre.resultName, su.userName AS cUserName, d.reviewFlag, d.detectDate
,d2.reviewDate,d2.reviewUserId,d2.reviewPicture,d2.reviewReagentId
FROM detect_report d LEFT JOIN product_object po ON d.objectId = po.objectId LEFT JOIN sys_company sc ON d.companyId = sc.companyId LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON d.detectUserId = su.userId LEFT JOIN detect_item di ON d.itemId = di.itemId LEFT JOIN detect_reagent dr ON d.reagentId = dr.reagentId LEFT JOIN product_type pt ON d.productTypeId = pt.typeId LEFT JOIN detect_source ds ON d.sourceId = ds.sourceId
LEFT JOIN detect_review d2 ON d.detectId = d2.detectId LEFT JOIN detect_result dre ON d2.reviewResultId = dre.resultId
LEFT JOIN detect_result dre ON d.resultId = dre.resultId
WHERE d.detectId = #{detectId}
